control.name: Gallery
control.helpHtml: Lets the user select a set of images and displays them.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Images
property.helpHtml: Sets the images to be used. Each image can have its own caption. By default two Rapid logos are placed in as an example of use.

property.name: Empty text
property.helpHtml: Text to display when there are no images present in the gallery.

property.name: On image click
property.getValuesFunction: return [["nothing","Do nothing"],["","Prompt to remove image"],["caption","Show image caption"],["preview","Show fullscreen"]];
property.helpHtml: What to do when an image in the gallery is clicked on.

property.name: Allow delete
property.helpHtml: Whether images can be deleted from the gallery when shown full screen.

runtimeProperty.name: Urls
